intro: Memecylon obscurinerve, commonly known as the dark-veined memecylon, is a species of flowering plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific Islands. The plant typically grows as an understory shrub, reaching heights of up to 2 meters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and have prominent, dark-colored veins. The flowers are small, clustered in umbels, and are often pink or purple in color.
